mapper.select:
select * from TBLSTAFF where STAFFID in( select distinct STAFFID from TBLPERGUIRELA where PERINSPID in( select PERINSPID from TBLGUISETMEAL where GUCHID in( select distinct GUCHID from TBLFINRESULT where ITEMID=(select itemId from TBLDEPPRORELA where depaId=#{depaId}) and GUCHID in( select GUCHID from TBLCHITEM where SUMMSTATEID=12 and itemId= ( select itemId from TBLDEPPRORELA where depaId=#{depaId} )))))
and STAFFNAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{staffName}),'%')
select INTFACEID from TBLDEPAR where DEPAID=#{depeId}
select * from TBLITEM where ITEMID=( select ITEMID from TBLDEPPRORELA where DEPAID=#{depeId})
select GUCHID from TBLXIAOJIE where DEPAID=#{depaid} and GUCHID=#{guChId}
select * from TBLFINRESULT where GUCHID=#{guChId} and ITEMID=#{itemId}
select imageFile from tblguchimagerela where ITEMID=#{itemId} and GUCHID=#{guChId}
